UnrestrictedGame

Class UnrestrictedGuessingGameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • UnrestrictedGame.UnrestrictedGuessingGameView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable

    public class UnrestrictedGuessingGameView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    GuessingGameView has logic and GUI of the game
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void addAnswers()
      a method to add answer panel to the South Panel after removing everything in South Panel
      private void addInstruction()
      a method to add instruction and topic panel to the Center Panel
      private void addQuestions()
      a method to add question panel to the Center Panel after removing everything in Center Panel
      private void addUnrestricted()
      a method to add panel for unrestricted part to the Center Panel after removing everything in Center Panel
      private void changeBackground()
      a method to change background photo in North Panel after removing previous photo
      private javax.swing.JPanel createAnswerPanel()
      a panel that contains answers taken from the XML file
      private javax.swing.JPanel createCenterP()
      create a JPanel at the Center of the frame
      private javax.swing.JPanel createCountryPanel()
      a JPanel that contains 17 country names
      private javax.swing.JPanel createNorthP()
      create a JPanel at the North of the frame first, let it contain a background image
      private javax.swing.JPanel createQuestionPanel()
      a panel that contains questions taken from the XML file
      private javax.swing.JPanel createSouthP()
      create a JPanel at the South of the frame add the Start button so that user can start playing
      private javax.swing.JButton createSubmitPanel()
      create submit button when button clicked, add input from users to the binary tree and restart the game
      private javax.swing.JPanel createUnrestrictedP()
      a JPanel that contains questions and text field for unrestricted part
      private void initGUI()
      private method to create the GUI components returns the created main panel
      private javax.swing.JButton noButton()
      a button associated with "no" answer from users when button clicked, if there is left child of the node is availble, display text of that left child otherwise, it means users want to add their own countries add panel for unrestricted part
      private void restartGame()
      restart button
      private javax.swing.JButton startButton()
      a start button for user to start the game when button clicked, question and answer panels appear
      private javax.swing.JButton yesButton()
      a button associated with "yes" answer from users when button clicked, if there is left child of the node is available, display text of that left child otherwise, change background and display "Enjoy your trip"
